developerExperience.title: Developer Experience
developerExperience.description: The Developer Experience prioritizes the specification and implementation of robust, well-documented, loosely coupled components & services, integrated into a coherent toolkit open to contributions from diverse skill sets.

educatorExperience.title: Educator Experience
educatorExperience.description: The Educator Experience prioritizes the creation of guided paths through a curriculum via the creation of learning materials that are autonomous, structurally aligned, composable, auditable, extensible, versioned and independent.

learnerExperience.title: Learner Experience
learnerExperience.description: The Learner Experience prioritizes web interactions that are engaging, contextual, linkable, searchable, accessible and responsive. In addition, the experience should foster a sense of community and connection among fellow learners.

valuesSection.title: The Values of the project

creditsSection.title: A fully Open Source project
creditsSection.description: Tutors is an open source project available for free under the MIT license on GitHub.
